Package org.jcvi.jillion.sam.index

This package contains classes for working with BAM indexes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Bin
    Bin is an object representation of a single bin in the binning scheme used to index reads in a reference alignment.
    ReferenceIndex
    ReferenceIndex is an object representations of a BAM index file's list of bins and linear intervals used for indexing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BamIndex
    BamIndex is an object representation of an entire BAM index (.bai) file.
    BamIndexFileWriterBuilder
    BamIndexFileWriterBuilder is a class that will create a BAM index file from a sorted BAM input file.
    Chunk
    A Chunk represents a single span of alignments where all the aligned reads in the sorted BAM belong to the same Bin.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.sam.index Description

This package contains classes for working with BAM indexes.
Author:
dkatzel
